metadata.title: CVE-2014-9275 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
UnRTF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-boundsmemory access and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a craftedRTF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unrtf - 0.21.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrtf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.21.5-2').
